title: ChatSearchCriteria
description: A context type that represents a simple search criterion, based on a list of other context objects, that can be used to search or filter messages in a chat application.

criteria.title: Search Criteria array
criteria.description:
An array of criteria that should match chats returned from by a search.

⚠️ Operators (and/or/not) are not defined in `fdc3.chat.searchCriteria`. It is up to the application that processes the FDC3 Intent to choose and apply the operators between the criteria.

Empty search criteria can be supported to allow resetting of filters.

SearchCriteria.title: Search Criteria
SearchCriteria.description: An individual criteria against which to match chat messages, based on an FDC3 context or free-text string.

oneOf.title: Free text
oneOf.description: Free text to be used for a keyword search
